com.norbl.cbp.ppe
Class PPEApp

java.lang.Object
  com.norbl.cbp.ppe.PPEApp
Direct Known Subclasses:
OmpiPPEApp
public abstract class PPEApp
extends java.lang.Object

Concrete extensions of this class launch the network manager app. It handles creating the PPEManager and the network manager JFrame.
